meanings.definition: Prosauropods: a group of herbivorous dinosaurs that lived during the late Triassic period.
meanings.sent1: The prosauropods roamed the land searching for plants to eat.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of prosauropods to learn about ancient herbivorous dinosaurs.
meanings.sent3: The prosauropods had a picnic in the prehistoric park.
meanings.sent4: The prosauropods stood tall like gentle giants of the past.
meanings.sent5: Children love to imagine the prosauropods munching on leaves in the ancient forests.

meanings.definition: Prosauropods: relating to or characteristic of prosauropods.
meanings.sent1: The prosauropods features were unique among dinosaurs.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a detailed model of the prosauropods skeleton.
meanings.sent3: The prosauropods-themed party decorations were a hit.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as gentle as a prosauropods footprint.
meanings.sent5: The prosauropods-like appearance of the creature fascinated the researchers.

meanings.definition: Prosauropods: the plural form of prosauropod.
meanings.sent1: In the museum, you can see the skeletons of prosauropods.
meanings.sent2: The prosauropods were a diverse group of ancient creatures.
meanings.sent3: The prosauropods gathered for a family reunion in the fossil exhibit.
meanings.sent4: The prosauropods' footprints left a trail of history in the rock.
meanings.sent5: The prosauropods' presence in the ecosystem shaped the environment of their time.
